title: "Stopord TFS"
format: html
editor: visual
---


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(stopwords)
```


```{r}
tfs <- read_csv("data/tfs_structured.csv")
```

```{r}
tfs_tidy <- tfs %>% 
  unnest_tokens(word, content)
```



```{r}
tfs_tidy %>% 
  count(word, sort = TRUE)
```

```{r}
stopord_da <- tibble(word = stopwords("da"))
```


```{r}
stopord_de <- tibble(word = stopwords("de"))
```



```{r}
tfs_stopord <-tfs_tidy %>%
  anti_join(stopord_da) %>% 
  anti_join(stopord_de) %>% 
  count(word, sort = TRUE) %>%
  slice_max(n, n = 100) %>% 
  select(word) 
```


```{r}
write_csv(tfs_stopord, "../data/tfs_stop.csv")
```
